headline.print_headline: Study Links Stroke Risk and Length of Workweek
headline.main: Researchers Link Longer Work Hours and Stroke Risk

docs.abstract: An analysis of data on more than 600,000 people is the largest study thus far of the relationship between working hours and cardiovascular health.
docs.snippet: An analysis of data on more than 600,000 people is the largest study thus far of the relationship between working hours and cardiovascular health.

headline.print_headline: Teens' e-Cigarette Use Linked With Later Smoking
headline.main: Teens' e-Cigarette Use Linked With Later Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: Teens who use e-cigarettes are more likely than others to later smoke conventional cigarettes and other tobacco products, a study at 10 Los Angeles high schools suggests.
docs.snippet: Teens who use e-cigarettes are more likely than others to later smoke conventional cigarettes and other tobacco products, a study at 10 Los Angeles high schools suggests.
